dict.acceptation: 感兴趣的；拥有权益的；有成见的；

sent.orig: I'm not interested. Definitely not interested.
sent.trans: 我不感兴趣。一点也不感兴趣。

sent.orig: If you're really interested in one person, you're not interested in anyone else.
sent.trans: 如果你真心喜欢一个人，你就不会对另外的人感兴趣。

sent.orig: The husband is interested in football and the wife is interested in plays.
sent.trans: 丈夫对足球感兴趣，妻子对戏曲感兴趣。

sent.orig: They may not be interested in religion, but they are interested in the good news.
sent.trans: 他们可能对宗教没兴趣，可是他们对好消息有兴趣。

sent.orig: If I am interested in people, others are interested not so in who as in how.
sent.trans: 如果说我是对人感兴趣，那么其他人的兴趣则在于如何而不是人物。
